gettysburg.common

Interface BattleDescriptor


  • public interface BattleDescriptor

    The BattleDescriptor is a simple data structure that represents the units involved in one battle in the game.

    When presented to the client by the GbgGame, it describes all units that might possibly participate in a battle. The client decides which units will actually participate and then uses that selection to create a new BattleDescriptor that tells the GbgGame how to apply the distribution of units.

    Version:
    Jun 8, 2017
